arguments.operationTitle: Get Analysis Report for Multiple Hashcodes

arguments.ha_score: {%if vars.ha_data|length>0%}{%set tmp_verdict = (vars.ha_data|json_query('[].verdict')|unique)%}{%if 'malicious' in tmp_verdict or 'suspicious' in tmp_verdict%}{%if 'malicious' not in tmp_verdict%}5{%else%}10{%endif%}{%else%}0{%endif%}{%endif%}

routes.name: Get Hash Reputation -> Is In DB
Is In DB -> Compute Report Sections
routes.label: yes

routes.name: Compute Report Sections -> Copy  of Output Data
